Articles.Content:
KSP Version:  0.1.1.0.21572
Operating System and version: Windows 11 Ver. 21H2 build 22000.1696
CPU: Intel i7-11700F 2.50 GHz, 48 GB RAM
GPU: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Ti 6 GB RAM

This is a weird one but easy to recreate. Lighting not properly applied to a Kerbal on EVA. When doing an EVA from a vehicle on the launch pad at night, the vehicle is well lit but the Kerbal on EVA is dark, it is not lit at all by the launch pad lighting.
